    • uploadImage

      public com.google.firebase.storage.UploadTask uploadImage(String path, String source, byte[] imageData)
      Uploads image to Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      path - the path where the image will be stored
      imageData - the byte data of the image to upload
      Returns:
      an UploadTask that can be used to monitor the upload
